 21  from __future__ import division 
 22  from imusim.trajectories.sampled import SampledPositionTrajectory, SampledRotationTrajectory 
 23  from imusim.trajectories.sampled import SampledTrajectory 
 24  from imusim.maths.vector_splines import PartialInputVectorSpline 
 25  from imusim.maths.quat_splines import PartialInputQuaternionBSpline 
 26  from imusim.utilities.caching import CacheLastValue 
 27  from imusim.utilities.time_series import TimeSeries

 29 -class SplinedPositionTrajectory(SampledPositionTrajectory): 

 30      """ 
 31      Trajectory with position obtained by splining a sampled trajectory. 
 32      """ 
 33   

 34 -    def __init__(self, sampled, positionStdDev=0.001, positionSplineOrder=5, **kwargs): 

 35          """ 
 36          Initialise trajectory. 
 37   
 38          @param sampled: position samples (L{SampledPositionTrajectory}) 
 39          @param positionStdDev: standard deviation of position samples (float) 
 40          @param positionSplineOrder: order of B-spline used for interpolation 
 41          """ 
 42          self.sampled = sampled 
 43          self._positionSpline = PartialInputVectorSpline( 
 44              sampled.positionKeyFrames.timestamps, 
 45              sampled.positionKeyFrames.values, 
 46              stddev=positionStdDev, order=positionSplineOrder) 

 47   
 48      @property 

 49 -    def _positionStartTime(self): 

 50          return self._positionSpline.validFrom 

 51   
 52      @property 

 53 -    def _positionEndTime(self): 

 54          return self._positionSpline.validTo 

 55   
 56      @property 

 57 -    def positionKeyFrames(self): 

 58          t = self.sampled.positionKeyFrames.timestamps 
 59          t = t[(t >= self.startTime) & (t <= self.endTime)] 
 60          p = self.position(t) 
 61          return TimeSeries(t, p) 

 62   
 63      @CacheLastValue() 

 64 -    def position(self, t): 

 65          return self._positionSpline(t, 0) 

 66   
 67      @CacheLastValue() 

 68 -    def velocity(self, t): 

 69          return self._positionSpline(t, 1) 

 70   
 71      @CacheLastValue() 

 72 -    def acceleration(self, t): 

 73          return self._positionSpline(t, 2) 

 74   
 75      @property 

 76 -    def startTime(self): 

 77          return self._positionStartTime 

 78   
 79      @property 

 80 -    def endTime(self): 

 81          return self._positionEndTime

 83 -class SplinedRotationTrajectory(SampledRotationTrajectory): 

 84      """Trajectory with rotation obtained by splining a sampled trajectory.""" 
 85   

 86 -    def __init__(self, sampled, smoothRotations=True, rotationStdDev=0.001, **kwargs): 

 87          """ 
 88          Initialise trajectory. 
 89   
 90          @param sampled: rotation samples (L{SampledPositionTrajectory}) 
 91          @param smoothRotations: `True` to apply smoothing to rotation prior 
 92              to splining (Bool) 
 93          @param rotationStdDev: standard deviation of rotation samples (float) 
 94          """ 
 95          self.sampled = sampled 
 96          keyFrames = sampled.rotationKeyFrames.values.unflipped() 
 97          if smoothRotations: 
 98              keyFrames = keyFrames.smoothed(stddev=rotationStdDev) 
 99          self._rotationSpline = PartialInputQuaternionBSpline( 
100              sampled.rotationKeyFrames.timestamps, keyFrames) 

101   
102      @property 

103 -    def _rotationStartTime(self): 

104          return self._rotationSpline.validFrom 

105   
106      @property 

107 -    def _rotationEndTime(self): 

108          return self._rotationSpline.validTo 

109   
110      @property 

111 -    def rotationKeyFrames(self): 

112          t = self.sampled.rotationKeyFrames.timestamps 
113          t = t[(t >= self.startTime) & (t <= self.endTime)] 
114          r = self.rotation(t) 
115          return TimeSeries(t, r) 

116   
117      @CacheLastValue() 

118 -    def rotation(self, t): 

119          return self._rotationSpline(t)[0] 

120   
121      @CacheLastValue() 

122 -    def rotationalVelocity(self, t): 

123          r, omega, alpha = self._rotationSpline(t) 
124          return r.rotateVector(omega) 

125   
126      @CacheLastValue() 

127 -    def rotationalAcceleration(self, t): 

128          r, omega, alpha = self._rotationSpline(t) 
129          return r.rotateVector(alpha) 

130   
131      @property 

132 -    def startTime(self): 

133          return self._rotationStartTime 

134   
135      @property 

136 -    def endTime(self): 

137          return self._rotationEndTime 

138   

139 -class SplinedTrajectory(SplinedPositionTrajectory, SplinedRotationTrajectory): 

140      """ 
141      Represents a splined position and rotation trajectory. 
142      """

144 -    def __init__(self, sampled, **kwargs): 

145          """ 
146          Initialise trajectory. 
147   
148          @param sampled: L{SampledTrajectory} 
149   
150          Keyword arguments are passed to L{SplinedPositionTrajectory} and 
151          L{SplinedRotationTrajectory} constructors. 
152          """ 
153          SplinedPositionTrajectory.__init__(self, sampled, **kwargs) 
154          SplinedRotationTrajectory.__init__(self, sampled, **kwargs) 

155   
156      @staticmethod 

157 -    def fromArrays(time, position, rotation): 

158          """ 
159          Construct a L{SplinedTrajectory} from time, position and rotation arrays. 
160   
161          @param time: sequence of sample times. 
162          @param position: sequence of position samples. 
163          @param rotation: sequence of rotation samples. 
164          """ 
165          return SplinedTrajectory(SampledTrajectory.fromArrays(time, position, rotation)) 

166   
167      @property 

168 -    def startTime(self): 

169          return max(self._positionStartTime, self._rotationStartTime) 

170   
171      @property 

172 -    def endTime(self): 

173          return min(self._positionEndTime, self._rotationEndTime)
